About1: The KMRT Radio App streams audio originally played in a major American department store during the Early 90s.
About2: Similar to the in-store experience, you cannot scrub these audio tracks. You can only jump around to different time eras.
About3: Some months had different tapes for different weeks, and you can skip forward between weeks using the next and previous options, when available.
About4: All Audio is sourced from and streams from the Internet Archive.
